column6: - Miracleman and Miraclewoman return to Earth as Olympus' pantheon grows! - Weeks old, Baby Winter decides it's time that she and her father discuss her future. - The Firedrake that brought Miracleman's makers to Earth is discovered! - With his family gone, Michael Moran faces a somber decision. - Johnny Bates utters four short syllables that will shatter the world. - Including material originally presented in MIRACLEMAN (1985) #14, plus bonus content.
